mianMenuManagerCreditsMenuText.0: XtremeWave Team: Slok ELinmei FangkuaiYa Duye ... [https://discord.gg/77RkMJHWsM]Discord[] Draco Cordraconis Streamblox (formerly) Thanks to all our discord helpers! Thanks to miniduikboot & GD for hosting modded servers (and so much more) Other Credits & Resources: OxygenFilter - For the versions v2.3.0 to v2.6.1, we were using the OxygenFilter for automatic deobfuscation Reactor - The framework used for all versions before v2.0.0, and again since 4.2.0 BepInEx - Used to hook game functions Essentials - Custom game options by DorCoMaNdO: Before v1.6: We used the default Essentials release v1.6-v1.8: We slightly changed the default Essentials. v2.0.0 and later: As we were not using Reactor anymore, we are using our own implementation, inspired by the one from DorCoMaNdO Jackal and Sidekick - Original idea for the Jackal and Sidekick came from Dhalucard Among-Us-Love-Couple-Mod - Idea for the Lovers modifier comes from Woodi-dev Jester - Idea for the Jester role came from Maartii ExtraRolesAmongUs - Idea for the Engineer and Medic role came from NotHunter101. Also some code snippets from their implementation were used. Among-Us-Sheriff-Mod - Idea for the Sheriff role came from Woodi-dev TooManyRolesMods - Idea for the Detective and Time Master roles comes from Hardel-DW. Also some code snippets from their implementation were used. TownOfUs - Idea for the Swapper, Shifter, Arsonist and a similar Mayor role came from Slushiegoose Ottomated - Idea for the Morphling, Snitch and Camouflager role came from Ottomated Crowded-Mod - Our implementation for 10+ player lobbies was inspired by the one from the Crowded Mod Team Goose-Goose-Duck - Idea for the Vulture role came from Slushiegoose TheEpicRoles - Idea for the first kill shield (partly) and the (old) tabbed option menu (fully + some code), by LaicosVK DasMonschta Nova ugackMiner53 - Idea and core code for the Prop Hunt game mode TheOtherRolesGMIA - Some code from Imp11 Role Draft Music: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9STiQ8cCIo0]Unreal Superhero 3 by Kenët & Rez[] License: TheOtherRoles-Rework is licensed under the [https://github.com/TheOtherRolesAU/TheOtherRoles?tab=GPL-3.0-1-ov-file#readme]GPLv3[]
mianMenuManagerCreditsMenuText.13: XtremeWave 团队: Slok ELinmei FangkuaiYa Duye ... [https://qm.qq.com/q/oE3BmsFM9q]QQ[] 特别感谢 miniduikboot & GD 托管模组服务器（及其他支持） 其他致谢与资源: OxygenFilter - v2.3.0 至 v2.6.1 版本使用其自动反混淆工具 Reactor - v2.0.0 之前及 4.2.0 之后版本使用的框架 BepInEx - 用于挂钩游戏函数 Essentials - 由 DorCoMaNdO 开发的定制游戏选项: v1.6 前: 使用标准 Essentials 版本 v1.6-v1.8: 对 Essentials 进行微调 v2.0.0 及后续: 基于 DorCoMaNdO 方案自主实现 Jackal 与 Sidekick - 角色概念源自 Dhalucard Among-Us-Love-Couple-Mod - 恋人修饰器灵感来自 Woodi-dev 小丑 - 角色概念源自 Maartii ExtraRolesAmongUs - 工程师与医生角色灵感来自 NotHunter101，部分代码参考实现 Among-Us-Sheriff-Mod - 警长角色概念来自 Woodi-dev TooManyRolesMods - 侦探与时间大师角色灵感来自 Hardel-DW，部分代码参考实现 TownOfUs - 换票师、转换者、纵火犯及类似市长角色概念来自 Slushiegoose Ottomated - 变形者、告密者与伪装者角色概念来自 Ottomated Crowded-Mod - 10+ 玩家大厅实现参考其方案 Goose-Goose-Duck - 秃鹫角色概念来自 Slushiegoose TheEpicRoles - 首杀护盾(部分) 和标签式选项菜单(完整+代码) 来自 LaicosVK DasMonschta Nova ugackMiner53 - 道具猎杀模式核心代码与创意 TheOtherRolesGMIA - 一些代码来自Imp11 轮抽选角音乐:[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9STiQ8cCIo0]Unreal Superhero 3 by Kenët & Rez[] 许可证: TheOtherRoles-Rework 采用 [https://github.com/TheOtherRolesAU/TheOtherRoles?tab=GPL-3.0-1-ov-file#readme]GPLv3[]

guesserButtonTooltip.0: An extension to the Classic-Gamemode and gives you a multitude of new options for Guessers.
guesserButtonTooltip.13: 经典游戏模式的扩展，为赌怪提供了众多新选项。

HideNSeekButtonTooltip.0: A standalone Gamemode where Hunter have to catch their prey ("Hunted" players).
HideNSeekButtonTooltip.13: 一个独立的游戏模式，抓捕者必须抓住他们的猎物（“猎物”职业）。

PropHuntButtonTooltip.0: A standalone Gamemode where Hunters have to find the disguised players ("Props").
PropHuntButtonTooltip.13: 一个独立的游戏模式，抓捕者必须找到伪装的玩家（“道具”）。

detectiveReportNone.13: 尸检报告: 尸体已经腐烂了!

peacedoveReloadText.13: 和平之鸽重置了你的冷却时间！

shieldedMurderAttemptText.0: Failed Murder Attempt on Shielded Player

mediumWarlockSuicide.0: MAYBE I cursed the person next to me and killed myself. Oops.
mediumWarlockSuicide.13: 我好像诅咒了我旁边的人然后把我杀了

mediumThiefSuicide.0: I tried to steal the gun from their pocket, but they were just happy to see me.
mediumThiefSuicide.13: 我试图从他们的口袋里偷走手枪，但是他们很高兴见到我

mediumActiveLoverDies.0: I wanted to get out of this toxic relationship anyways.
mediumActiveLoverDies.13: 我早就想摆脱他的束缚了！

mediumPassiveLoverSuicide.0: The love of my life died, thus with a kiss I die.
mediumPassiveLoverSuicide.13: 我一生最爱的人离开了我，因此我吻了我最爱的人后离开了人世

mediumLawyerKilledByClient.0: My client killed me. Do I still get paid?
mediumLawyerKilledByClient.13: 我的客户把我杀了，我还能得到报酬吗？

mediumJackalKillsSidekick.0: First they sidekicked me, then they killed me. At least I don't need to do tasks anymore.
mediumJackalKillsSidekick.13: 首先他们把我招募了，其次又把我杀了...至少我不用再做任务了

mediumImpostorTeamkill.0: I guess they confused me for the Spy, is there even one?
mediumImpostorTeamkill.13: 他们好像把我当成卧底了...或许根本没有卧底

mediumBodyCleaned.0: Is my dead body some kind of art now or... aaand it's gone.
mediumBodyCleaned.13: 我的尸体好像是一种艺术啊...不！它消失了！

mediumQuestion1.0: If my role hasn't been saved, there's no {0} in the game anymore.
mediumQuestion1.13: 如果我没有存活，那么场上就不会再有{0}了

mediumQuestion2.0: I'm not sure, but I guess a {0} color killed me.
mediumQuestion2.13: 我不太确定，但是我感觉一个{0}颜色击杀了我

mediumQuestion3.0: If I counted correctly, I died {0}s before the next meeting started.
mediumQuestion3.13: 如果我没数错的话，那么我在会议前{0}秒死亡的

mediumQuestion4.0: It seems like my killer was the {0}.

mediumQuestion5.0: I was a {0} without another role.

mediumPlayerNeutral.0: {0} player who is neutral but cannot kill
mediumPlayerNeutral.13: {0}名不能使用击杀的中立玩家

mediumPlayerNeutralPlural.0: {0} players who are neutral but cannot kill
mediumPlayerNeutralPlural.13: {0}名不能使用击杀的中立玩家

impostorShowTeamText.0: Remember your companions in case they go rogue.
impostorShowTeamText.13: 记住队友以防他们被招募
